body.name: Epson Expression Premium XP-6100 Wireless Color Photo Printer with Scanner and Copier, Black, Medium
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 22 hrs 45 mins
features: Epson printing system is designed to be used exclusively with Epson Genuine Cartridges. Use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s ltd. wnty.
Superior photo quality with 5-color inks — Print stunning photos up to 8" X 10", Plus Sharp text for eye-catching documents; includes dedicated photo and DVD trays.
Fast 4" X 6" Photos — in as little as 15 seconds (1)
Convenient FEATURES — Auto 2-sided printing, built-in USB and memory card slots (3).
Hands-free, voice-activated printing (2) — Print a variety of creative projects and everyday documents, including your to-do and shopping lists.
Fast print speeds — 15. 8 ISO ppm (Black) and 11. 3 ISO ppm (color)
Hassle-free photo preview and printing — 2. 4" Color LCD.
Ultimate wireless — Easy iPad, iPhone, Android tablet and smartphone printing (4); includes Wi-Fi Direct (5) for network-free printing.
Affordable individual ink cartridges — replace only the cartridge that runs out.
Small-in-one — Ultra powerful performance, Ultra slim design.
body.description: Ultra powerful and ultra slim, the expression Premium XP-6100 wireless Small-in-One printer delivers superior photo quality, with 5-color inks for stunning photos up to 8" X 10". And, it’s fast: print 4" X 6" Photos in as fast as 15 seconds (1), or documents at speeds of 15. 8 ISO ppm (Black) and 11. 3 ISO ppm (color)(†). designed for convenient, hassle-free printing, the XP-6100 features hands-free, voice-activated printing (2) for an array of jobs, plus built-in USB and memory card slots (3), a 2. 4" Color LCD, and dedicated photo/DVD trays. And, you can easily Print from your iPad, iPhone, Android tablet or smartphone (4) — with or without a router. this product uses only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as Compatible, may not function properly. † Black and color print speeds are measured in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734. Actual print times will vary based on factors including system configuration, software, and page complexity. Color photo in draft mode on premium photo paper glossy measured from start of paper feed. Actual print times will vary based on factors including system configuration, software, and page complexity. For more information, visit our official site. 2. See our official site for device compatibility. Requires Epson connect account. 3. Adapter may be required. 4. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device. For a list of Epson Connect enabled printers and compatible devices and apps, visit our official site. 5. Wi-fi CERTIFIED; level of performance subject to the range of the router being used. Wi-fi Direct may require printer software. 6. For convenient and reasonable recycling options, visit our official site. 7. Smart Way is an innovative partnership of the U. S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency. this Epson printer is designed for use with only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as Compatible, may not function properly or at all. Epson provides information about the design of the printer on the box and in many other locations and materials Included with the printer and on the website.epson periodically provides firmware updates to address issues of security, performance, minor bug fixes and ensure the printer functions as designed. This printer was designed to work only with genuine Epson ink cartridges and some updates may affect the functionality of third party ink. Non-epson branded or Altered Epson cartridges that functioned prior to a firmware update may not continue to function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Two years ago I looked for a single function printer. The only one I could find was a Canon G5020 and bought it. A BIG Mistake! It was a nightmare to print anything. The WiFi never worked well. Bought a USB direct connect cable. It worked for two weeks and just quit working at all. So I found and bought the Epson XP. For the price it's the best printer I've owned. And the scan functions have options that will work great for me! User functions are straight forward. Quality is just plain great. Thank you Epson for a great printer at a great price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars won't stay connected
reviews.reviewText: EVERY time I try to print, I find that this thing has been disconnected YET AGAIN. The Epson printer connection checker can't find it, despite the thing being on and installed, with the correct driver. Windows troubleshooter says it works OK, but when I try to print to it, the doc sits in the queue with an error that the printer is disconnected (it's not). This is so frustrating. I've re-installed the driver multiple times and made sure it's the latest version. When connected, it works OK and prints quality photos, which is why we bought it. But I am so regretting that we opted for this POS that is a hassle to print every. single. time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wish it were better...
reviews.reviewText: For the price, I suppose this printer is decent. The quality is iffy on some printouts (tends to blur at the edge sometimes). I have not yet been able to print out a good photo. Maybe it's just me. My biggest gripe of all is that I'm buying ink VERY frequently. I don't print items every day, and when I do it's one or two pages. However, I am buying black ink monthly (yes, it is the genuine HP full price ink). The ink cartridges do not last long at all. When I researched this product it got great reviews, most of them saying the ink lasted an appropriate amount of time. I do not agree with this assessment. Buyer beware....even though the cartridges are cheap (a factor that spurred me to buy this item), they don't last long enough and therefore you're really paying more for ink. The power button is a bit picky - sometimes it takes more than one push of the button to turn it on or off. The printer must be on for the item you're printing, which is different than my old one. Those two are minor issues, but on top of the constant purchasing of ink and the blurring of one side I would not recommend this printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have not had to use Tech Support for this printer. Print looks great.
reviews.reviewText: I had the printer before this one XP-6000 and had ink on hand for that one that fits this new one. So I ordered the XP-6100 to replace the XP-6000. Both printers are little work horses!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Setup is complicated. It took me 1/2 day to get the wireless printer connected. The print quality is good. I'm disappointed that the printer doesn't hold more paper though. It makes decent scans. I've had it for a few weeks so I'm not sure how long the ink will hold out as the cartridges aren't very big. All in all, this printer replaces an older Epson. Doing my homework, ALL ink jet printers have problems as feedback shows many people are fed up with them, no matter what brand you buy. This isn't a glowing review, but an accurate review as to my experience. So far it makes an acceptable home printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The trays on this model will drive you crazy!
reviews.reviewText: Had a Epson WF 3520 for years and was very happy with it. Unfortunately the WF stopped working and decided to get a new one. Have had this printer for about three months and have hated it from day one. The print quality is very good, especially the photos but the trays are awful. First, everything is black which makes it very hard to see what you are doing. The three trays are flimsy and are stacked on top of each other which makes reinserting them extremely difficult. The paper trays holds a quarter inch of paper so you are constantly having to refill the tray. The part that keeps the paper from falling on the floor is constantly in the way when trying to insert the tray and with it being so flimsy also afraid you're going to break something. I was going to also complain about the constant (daily) firmware updates that prevent you from printing unless you tell it to do something but found a YouTube that gave directions on preventing that. Bottom line I would not recommend this printer to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well - but Android users be advised!
reviews.reviewText: The Epson XP-6100 does a fine job and I appreciate how it's not overloaded with crap features - like an automatic document feeder.But if you're an Android user you may wonder why the XP-6100 will fail to print with the app reporting "printer not available".Here's what happened and how to fix it:On your phone or other Android device is an app called Epson Print Enabler. It's essential for printing to an Epson device. Like any Android app Print Enabler will be periodically updated. Until you open the Enabler app and agree to the license terms, the printer will be unavailable.So be warned; every couple of months Epson Print Enabler will be updated and your printing is nada until you accept the updated license terms.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy set up to good prints
reviews.reviewText: Easy to follow setup instructions. Great print quality. Performs as advertised.

This is a very compact printer. When it's not on, everything retracts. Has multiple trays for specialized printing. Nice bright LCD screen as well. Takes a little time to go through the set-up procedure, but it is easy to do. Print quality is excellent!
Los cartuchos son muy difíciles de conseguir y además caros !

I bought an Epson XP6100 printer on-line from NES Online through Amazon. The item arrived promptly on the first day of the expected delivery window. It was brand new in its manufacturers packaging and has worked like a dream. It seems quieter than previous Epson printers I have owned, and the scanning function operates quicker and at better resolution than previous scanners, probably due to improved software.

Have printed a few photos with decent quality.Black and white pages with good quality.Color prints good qualityI like the feed tray setupThere are pre-prints in the home menu like graph paper etc. Neat feature and I find myself using it often. Can print lined paper etc
